name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience in **Python** and a strong focus on building scalable **distributed systems** and **APIs**. Proficient in **asynchronous programming** and **concurrency**, with hands-on expertise in **microservices** architecture and **containerization**. Adept at integrating complex systems and ensuring smooth production deployments. My technical prowess is complemented by a solid foundation in **debugging**, **profiling**, and **observability** practices to enhance application performance. 
In previous roles, I’ve developed high-performance backend solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors, using frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django**. I have extensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**, leading enterprise-grade platforms with AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. Additionally, I've successfully implemented CI/CD automation and have experience in developing machine learning pipelines using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
